altername_name: SIMPLEシリーズ Vol.5 THE 柔道
name: Simple Series Vol. 5: The Judo
overview: A fully-fledged judo sensation game from a first person perspective that operates with the Nunchaku and Wii remote as left and right arms is now available on WiiWare. Push through the defenses of the opponent and execute a thrilling throwing technique and aim for the win! Various tactics are also possible, such as acquiring skills and experience points, aiming at superiority and depriving the opponent's stamina and skill. From 20 selectable characters with different ability values, choose the one who matches your style of play, win various competitions, aim to be the world's best! By splitting the screen, you can also play against your friend. You can connect to the Wi-Fi connection for your ranking and you can check up to BEST 30th from all over the world, domestic and your friends list.
